roleset.name: to join by twining together
roleset.note: INTERTWINE-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. Member of VNcls amalgamate-22.2-2-1. (from intertwine.01-v)

example.name: passive
example.text: Albert Engelken and Robert Thomson had never met , though for 38 years [their lives]-1 had been intertwined [*-1]in a way peculiar to the sports world .
example.arg: in a way peculiar to the sports world
